sqlMap.select: SELECT CPYRHT_ID, CPYRHT_PRTC_POLICY_CN, TO_CHAR(FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNCPYRHTINFO WHERE CPYRHT_ID=#cpyrhtId#

SELECT CPYRHT_ID, CPYRHT_PRTC_POLICY_CN, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,CPY.* FROM ( SELECT CPYRHT_ID, CPYRHT_PRTC_POLICY_CN, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNCPYRHTINFO WHERE 1=1
CPYRHT_PRTC_POLICY_CN LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY CPYRHT_ID DESC ) CPY ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNCPYRHTINFO WHERE 1=1
CPYRHT_PRTC_POLICY_CN LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNCPYRHTINFO (CPYRHT_ID , CPYRHT_PRTC_POLICY_CN , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID) VALUES ( #cpyrhtId# , #cpyrhtPrtcPolicyCn# , sysdate , #frstRegisterId# , sysdate , #lastUpdusrId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE COMTNCPYRHTINFO SET CPYRHT_PRTC_POLICY_CN=#cpyrhtPrtcPolicyCn# , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=sysdate , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# WHERE CPYRHT_ID=#cpyrhtId#
